## Checklist
- [ ] Rule ID follows `R-CATEGORY-NN` convention (if adding a rule)
- [ ] Test fixture added in `tests/fixtures/` (if adding/modifying a check)
- [ ] Assertions added to `tests/run-tests.sh` or `tests/assertions/`

- [ ] Source cited in rules-reference.md (if adding a rule)
